title: Spectator Who Tossed Water Bottle at Mathieu van der Poel Turns Himself in to Police
content:
Mathieu van der Poel was hit in the face by a water bottle thrown at him by a spectator en route to Roubaix victory, and called for strong action.

Read the full article at Spectator Who Tossed Water Bottle at Mathieu van der Poel Turns Himself in to Police on Velo.
author: sstokes
